name: Chico's Family-Friendly Circus
description:
Chico's Family-Friendy Circus is a Point & Click with elements of horror and comedy. You take the position of Mank in his 2:00 - 4:00 A.M. shift and must manage to finish your job without consuming all the energy...Well, at least that's what's supposed to be.

Main features:

- Some different endings, but only one is the true;
- Short gameplay per shift (~12 minutes);
- 4 different cameras to check and spy;
- Lights on/off and sound on/off;
- At least 3 clowns, I think...
